titleStmt.title: A day-book of tax payments in kind on imperial estates
titleStmt.author: Unknown

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: 24th Herakles [;Ptolemaios [ ;Pasion, son of Hori( ) Maikenatiane ousia [;Pnepheros ..., Germanikiane ousia 73 1/2 1/4 1/12 artabai of wheat;Papontos, son of Sokrates, Germanikiane ousia 41 1/2 1/3 1/12 artabai of wheat;Serapammon, son of Ptolemaios, Alexandrianh ousia 160 artabai of wheat;total for the day 552 1/2 1/24 artabai of wheat of which Germanikiane 115 1/2 Senekane 140 Alexandriane 160 artabai, 108 1/2 1/3 1/12 artabai of Gallos, Maikenatiane 27 1/12 1/12;25th. Horos, son of Herakles Maikenatianh ousia 126 1/2 artabai of wheat;for the transportation tax of cleruchs4 1/4 artabai of wheat;Tamystha, daughter of Harpalos through Horos ...
